segments.text: Steven , can you give us a summary about your work ? What do you get from your work ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I have accumulated a wealth of practical experience in work as a chief advertisement designer . Moreover , I realized teamwork is the key to success .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I think building team spirit among the coworkers is very important . I believe we can accomplish a miracle if we stick together .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: My advantage is that I have strong sense of responsibility . But I lack patience .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I must praise you for your modesty and diligence . What's your plan next ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I will listen and learn more when I start my new job . I plan to become more professional in my field .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I've got to commend you ; you really did a good job .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Thanks for your compliment , but there is still plenty more to learn .
segments.speaker: S2
